title: List of all Android seekbar  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android seekbar  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: CircleSeekbar
repoList.description: an android circle seekbar library

repoList.name: SeekBarCompat
repoList.description: A simple material-based support library to bring consistent SeekBars on Android 14 and above

repoList.name: waveformSeekBar
repoList.description: Android Waveform SeekBar library

repoList.name: TickSeekBar
repoList.description: This is a custom SeekBar library on Android.

repoList.name: RubberPicker
repoList.description: Android Rubber Picker Library

repoList.name: ProtractorView
repoList.description: A semicircular seekbar view for selecting angle from 0° to 180° :sparkles:

repoList.name: EmojiSlider
repoList.description: 🤯 A slider widget rich in emoji and highly customisable.

repoList.name: RangeSeekBar
repoList.description: Android Range Seekbar library that support Min & Max Value for API level >= 16 and support Step Value

repoList.name: PrettySeekBar
repoList.description: Simple, minimalistic circular seekbar library with animation for android, inspired from analog clock.
